mapper.update:
update tom_project_classify
project_name = #{projectName,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
project_name_en = #{projectNameEn,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
project_number = #{projectNumber,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
parent_project_id = #{parentProjectId,jdbcType=INTEGER},
project_introduction = #{projectIntroduction,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
project_introduction_en = #{projectIntroductionEn,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
admins = #{admins,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
creator = #{creator,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
create_time = #{createTime,jdbcType=DATE},
operator = #{operator,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
update_time = #{updateTime,jdbcType=DATE},
creator_id = #{creatorId,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
operator_id = #{operatorId,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
where project_id = #{projectId,jdbcType=INTEGER}

update tom_project_classify set project_name = #{projectName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, project_name_en = #{projectNameEn,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, project_number = #{projectNumber,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, parent_project_id = #{parentProjectId,jdbcType=INTEGER}, project_introduction = #{projectIntroduction,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, project_introduction_en = #{projectIntroductionEn,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, admins = #{admins,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, creator = #{creator,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, create_time = #{createTime,jdbcType=DATE}, operator = #{operator,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, update_time = #{updateTime,jdbcType=DATE}, creator_id = #{creatorId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, operator_id = #{operatorId,jdbcType=VARCHAR} where project_id = #{projectId,jdbcType=INTEGER}
mapper.select:
select count(*) from tom_project_classify where project_id in (${ids})
and INSTR(project_name,#{example.projectName,jdbcType=VARCHAR})>0

select
FROM tom_project_classify where project_id in (${ids})
and INSTR(project_name,#{example.projectName,jdbcType=VARCHAR})>0
order by isnull(project_number)-1, project_number asc limit #{startNum,jdbcType=DECIMAL},#{endNum,jdbcType=DECIMAL}

select
from tom_project_classify where PARENT_project_id = #{projectId,jdbcType=DECIMAL} order by isnull(project_number)-1, project_number asc

select
from tom_project_classify where project_id in (${classifyIds})
select project_id,project_NAME,project_NAME_EN, PARENT_project_id from tom_project_classify order by isnull(project_number)-1, project_number asc

select
FROM tom_project_classify where
and INSTR(project_name,#{example.projectName,jdbcType=VARCHAR})>0
limit #{startNum,jdbcType=DECIMAL},#{endNum,jdbcType=DECIMAL}

select count(*) from tom_project_classify where 1=1
and INSTR(project_name,#{example.projectName,jdbcType=VARCHAR})>0

select a.project_id, a.CLASSIFY_NUMBER, a.CLASSIFY_NAME, a.CLASSIFY_NAME_EN, a.PARENT_project_id, a.CLASSIFY_INTRODUCTION, a.CLASSIFY_INTRODUCTION_EN, a.ADMINS, a.CREATOR, a.CREATE_TIME, a.OPERATOR, a.UPDATE_TIME,a.CREATOR_ID from tom_project_classify a,tom_project_classify_RELATION b where b.STATUS='Y' and b.COURSE_ID=#{courseId,jdbcType=DECIMAL} and a.project_id=b.project_id
select tc.* from tom_project_resource tr left join tom_project_classify tc on tr. project_id = tc. project_id where tr.type = 'A' and tr. resource_id = #{resourceId,jdbcType=DECIMAL}
